ProductInfo.Features:
Professional 16 Channel H.264 HDMI DVR, iPhone, Andriod Viewing. Preview, record, playback, backup, network surveillance. USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
DVR Feature: 16 Channel H.264 video compression format; support D1 resolution HDMI output for better resolution ADPCM audio compression format PTZ Control  Multiple operation modes (Preview, record, playback, backup, network surveillance and Mobile monitoring) The video package time is adjustable USB2.0 backup, upgrade and mouse operation Multiple language OSD
GW50FW: Mini IR Medium Speed Indoor PTZ Dome Camera. 1/3" SONY Exview CCD, 600TVL, 10X Optical Zoom, F=1.6 f=4.8mm~48mm. IR distance up to 164 feet. Ambient light detection, 0.1 Lux Min illumination.
GW30WD: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 42pcs IR LED, 115 ft IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Great Image, Great for Entrance.
GW108M: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Indoor Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 36pcs IR LED, 98 ft IR Distance. Vandalproof. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Great Image, Great for Entrance.
ProductInfo.Name: Complete High End 16 Channel Real Time H.264 HDMI CCTV DVR (1TB HD) Security Camera Surveillance System Package w/ (1) 10X Zoom Indoor PTZ Camera and (15) x 700TVL 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Indoor Outdoor Cameras (1000 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable)
